content.query:
-- Diagnostic query to see the raw data
SELECT TOP 100
    TicketID,
    DateCreated,
    LEN(TicketID) as TicketID,
    LEN(DateCreated) as DateCreated,LEN(Category) as Category,LEN(Priority) as Priority,LEN(AssignedTeam) as AssignedTeam,LEN(Status) as Status,LEN(Description) as Description,LEN(RootCause) as RootCause
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://kraftsynapse.dfs.core.windows.net/incidentcontainer/tickets.csv',
        FORMAT='CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE
    ) WITH (
        TicketID NVARCHAR(50),
        DateCreated NVARCHAR(50),
        Category NVARCHAR(255),
        Priority NVARCHAR(50),
        AssignedTeam NVARCHAR(50),
        Status NVARCHAR(50),
        Description NVARCHAR(1000),
        RootCause NVARCHAR(255)
    ) AS [tickets];
